headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Presentation at the Barclays 2025 Global Consumer Staples Conference
summary: NEW YORK, August 19, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Chairman, President and CEO, Noel Wallace, will present on Wednesday, September 3, 2025 at 9:00 a.m. ET at the Barclays 2025 Global Consumer Staples Conference.
